name: Gabapentin
desc: Gabapentin (GPN), marketed under the brand name Neurontin among others, is a medication used to treat epilepsy, neuropathic pain, hot flashes, and restless leg syndrome. In epilepsy it may be used for those with partial seizures. It is recommended as one of a number of first line medications for the treatment of neuropathic pain in diabetic neuropathy, post-herpetic neuralgia, and central neuropathic pain. A 2014 review of its use for diabetic neuropathy and postherpetic neuralgia found that about 14% of people have a meaningful benefit.
